div.p: Constellation Schools provides every child an opportunity to obtain an excellent education built on a foundation of character education for life long success.

p.span: Please click the following link to view weekly updates, assignments, and other information provided by your teachers. There's also access to a virtual career fair.

strong.span:
Call Center for COVID-19/Coronavirus
Ohio Department of Health
1-833-4-ASK-ODH
strong.br:
Open seven days a week from 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM
For the general public regarding questions about Coronavirus
Cuyahoga County established a helpline for residents who have general questions about Coronavirus. This helpline is in addition to the Ohio Department of Health's call center.

strong.span:
COVID CareLine for Mental Health Support
Ohio Department of Mental Health and Addiction Services
1-800-720-9616
strong.br:
Open seven days a week from 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM
This toll-free, confidential careline provides emotional support to individuals who may be struggling to cope with current challenges in their lives.

br.span: Please click the following link to view resources provided by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and the Ohio Department of Health regarding the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19), including multilingual resources.

div.h1: From the Desk of Principal Delzani...

img.title: Sheila Delzani, Principal
img.style: float: right; margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 7px; left: 410px; top: 104px; width: 23%; height: 30%;

p.img: Welcome to Constellation Schools: Westpark Community Elementary! Both Constellation Schools: Westpark Community Elementary and Middle are located in the historic George Washington School building in Kamm’s Corner proudly for 18 years. Having both schools housed in one large connecting building allows families the opportunity to attend Westpark from grades Kindergarten to eighth grade making a seamless transition from elementary to middle school.

div.p: Westpark is committed to the educational growth of each student. We strive to work together to build a community of learners and are committed to helping your child reach their full academic potential through our individualized instruction. Character Education is a building block of our curriculum and helps teach our students the importance of being responsible citizens and contributing members of society. Our highly qualified teachers integrate technology into their classrooms to ensure that each child is successful and prepared to meet the demands of the 21st century.
If you would like to learn more about Constellation Schools: Westpark Community Elementary, please contact the school office at 216.688.0272 to schedule a school tour. We look forward to meeting you!

p.br: SaferOH tip line will allow students and adults to anonymously share information with school officials and law enforcement about threats to student safety - whether that involved threatened mass incident or harm of a single student.

div.p: Constellation Schools: Westpark Community Elementary does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding non-discrimination policies:
